recipe.title: The Greenest Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup fresh parsley, spinach, or kale leaves
Matcha is available at Japanese markets and online.
instructions: Purée banana, pineapple, parsley, almond milk, almond butter, flaxseed oil, agave, matcha, and ginger in a blender. Sweeten with more agave, if desired.
Purée banana, pineapple, parsley, almond milk, almond butter, flaxseed oil, agave, matcha, and ginger in a blender. Sweeten with more agave, if desired.
